"Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø´Ø®Ø§Øµ Ø¹Ø§Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ† Ùˆ Ø§Ù„Ø¯ÙˆÙ„Ø© Ùˆ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù…Ù‡ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ© Ùˆ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ·Ù† Ø¨Ø§Ù‚ÙŠÙ† Ø¨ÙØ¶Ù„ Ø§Ø¨Ù†Ø§Ø¡Ù‡Ø§ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ·Ù†ÙŠÙŠÙ†" -------- A great pleasure and honor to have participated in the first edition of the forum of Tunisian skills abroad on 06 and 07 August organized by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs at the International Academy of Diplomacy of Tunisia. As co-representative of two ngo RECONNECTT and Tunisian AI Society with Dr. Wissem AJILI BEN YOUSSEF An opportunity to get to know our compatriots from all over the world, share ideas and start working together for the good of our country. A great atmosphere, a wealth of expertise, valuable results and recommendations. Thank you to all the organizers. Thank you to His Excellency Minister Nabil Ammar for his frankness, his clear and unequivocal speech, his determination and his vigilance. Thank you to His Excellency Dhia KHALED and to our embassy. ğ‘¾ğ’† ğ’‚ğ’“ğ’† ğ’“ğ’Šğ’ˆğ’‰ğ’• ğ’•ğ’ ğ’‰ğ’‚ğ’—ğ’† ğ’•ğ’“ğ’–ğ’”ğ’•ğ’†ğ’… ğ’ğ’ğ’ğ’š ğ’ğ’–ğ’“ ğ’”ğ’•ğ’‚ğ’•ğ’† ğ’‡ğ’ğ’“ ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’Šğ’” ğ’•ğ’šğ’‘ğ’† ğ’ğ’‡ ğ’‡ğ’ğ’“ğ’–ğ’.
